titles.title: O Love divine, by Christ revealed

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Love divine, by Christ revealed, Incarnate Love that died for me, To Thee myself I gladly yield, I consecrate my all to Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Light divine, by Christ displayed, Source of all light, who flesh became, Shed Thy bright beams upon my head, Burn in my heart a constant flame.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Cross divine, by Christ endured, Thou cross on which He groaned and died, And manâ€™s redemption thus secured, In Thy blest shadow let me hide.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Peace divine, by Christ bestowed, Thy heavenly dove to earth come down, May He within make His abode, My life with His dear presence crown.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Joy divine, by Christ possessed, For which He did the cross endure, Fill with Thyself and make me blest, Contented, restful and secure.{/lang-eng}
